name: robe
content:

a long, loose piece of clothing worn especially on very formal occasions: Judges wear black robes when they are in court.
joebelanger/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
(also bathrobe) a loose piece of clothing that is worn before or after a bath or on top of clothing worn in bed: He wrapped a robe around himself before answering the door.
Yurdakul/iStock / Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
